text: Naoto Sago is a Japanese karateka. In 2018, he won the silver medal in the men's kumite −60 kg event at the 2018 World Karate Championships held in Madrid, Spain. He is scheduled to represent Japan at the 2020 Summer Olympics in karate. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable sortable" width=45% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Venue !!Rank!!Event |- |2018 |align=left|World Karate Championships |align=left| Madrid |bgcolor="silver"|2nd |Kumite −60 kg |} == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Japanese male karateka
title: Naoto Sago
